name: Pool TV
description:
Play TV Pool against a real player or against an artificial intelligent player (Ai) and rediscover the fun and and excitement of this classic game on the Big Screen.

With stunning high definition 3D graphics and realistic physics, you will feel like you have been transported to a pool room and playing on a real table.


Stunning High definition 3D graphics

Realistic game play and physics

Play Against a real person or an Ai player
